34.20.text: as we play another second round match.

1664.56.text: the writer recounts his period of servitude on plantations

1672.60.text: It's Louisiana. But you weren't there in time, Southampton, I'm afraid.

1675.88.text: If we'd gone on another few minutes, you might have overtaken them.

1678.84.text: We're going to have to say goodbye to you,

1680.64.text: but thank you very much, you've been a nice team to have with us.

1685.20.text: We'll look forward to seeing you in the quarterfinals,

1687.56.text: which go on and on and on. You'll enjoy them.

1690.36.text: I hope you can join us next time for another second-round match,

1693.44.text:
- but until then, it's goodbye from Southampton University... 
- Bye!
